actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to extend the duties of the Executive Protective Service to include the protection of the United Nations buildings in New York City.

summary.text: Extends the duties of the Executive Protective Service to include the protection of the United Nations buildings in New York City. Increases the size of such service to 920.

titles.title: A bill to extend the duties of the Executive Protective Service to include the protection of the United Nations buildings in New York City.
